Bernard Bloch (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernard_Bloch_(actor) 0 Bernard Bloch (born 11 December 1949) is a French actor and theatre director. Bernard_Bloch ( born_11_December_1949 ) is a_French_actor_and_theatre_director .
